mapper.select: SELECT cad.*, d.department_code, d.name as departmentName, (select sd.name from sys_department sd where sd.id = d.parent_id) as parentDepartmentName FROM sys_company c, sys_department d, sys_company_associate_unit cad WHERE c.id = cad.company_id AND cad.department_id = d.id AND c.id = #{companyId}

SELECT count(0) FROM sys_contact t WHERE t.company_id = #{companyId} and t.status = '1001' and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_department_user du WHERE t.id = du.user_id AND du.department_id = #{departmentId} )

SELECT t.* FROM sys_contact t WHERE t.company_id = #{companyId} and EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_department_user du WHERE t.id = du.user_id AND du.department_id = #{departmentId} )
AND (t.full_name like concat(concat('%', #{codeName}), '%') or t.employee_id like concat(concat('%', #{codeName}), '%'))
AND t.status = status
AND t.duty_code = #{dutyCode}

SELECT t.* FROM sys_set_of_books t WHERE t.enabled = 1 AND t.deleted = 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sys_company c, sys_company_associate_unit v WHERE c.set_of_books_id = t.id AND c.deleted = 0 AND c.enabled = 1 AND c.id = v.company_id AND v.enabled = 1 AND v.department_id = #{departmentId} )
